CMD·36 | Vow of Duty | Card Text | Paragraph 1
CMD·36 | Vow of Duty | Card Text | Paragraph 2

trans-unit.resname: CMD·46 | Flusterstorm | Card Name
CMD·46 | Flusterstorm | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Counter target instant or sorcery spell unless its controller pays {1}.

trans-unit.resname: CMD·46 | Flusterstorm | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Storm (When you cast this spell, copy it for each spell cast before it this turn. You may choose new targets for the copies.)
trans-unit.target: 风暴（当你施放此咒语时，本回合于它之前每施放过一个咒语，便将此咒语复制一次。你可以为每个复制品选择新的目标。）

trans-unit.resname: CMD·51 | Minds Aglow | Card Name
CMD·51 | Minds Aglow | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Join forces — Starting with you, each player may pay any amount of mana. Each player draws X cards, where X is the total amount of mana paid this way.
trans-unit.target: 携手～由你开始，每位牌手各可以支付任意数量的法术力。每位牌手各抓X张牌，X为以此法支付的法术力总数量。

trans-unit.resname: CMD·98 | Sewer Nemesis | Card Name
CMD·98 | Sewer Nemesis | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose a player.
trans-unit.target: 于暗渠宿敌进战场时，选择一位牌手。

trans-unit.resname: CMD·98 | Sewer Nemesis | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in the chosen player's graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 暗渠宿敌的力量和防御力各等同于所选牌手坟墓场中牌的数量。

trans-unit.resname: CMD·98 | Sewer Nemesis | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever the chosen player casts a spell, that player mills a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当所选牌手施放咒语时，该牌手磨一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: CMD·99 | Shared Trauma | Card Name
trans-unit.note: 非官方中文翻译来自legacy card name（2024-02-28）；

trans-unit.resname: CMD·103 | Syphon Flesh | Card Name
CMD·103 | Syphon Flesh | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each other player sacrifices a creature. You create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token for each creature sacrificed this way.
trans-unit.target: 每位其他牌手各牺牲一个生物。每有一个以此法牺牲的生物，你便派出一个2/2黑色灵俑衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: CMD·107 | Vow of Malice | Card Name
CMD·107 | Vow of Malice | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Enchant creature\nEnchanted creature gets +2/+2, has intimidate, and can't attack you or planeswalkers you control. (A creature with intimidate can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)
trans-unit.target: 结附于生物所结附的生物得+2/+2，具有威吓异能，且不能攻击你或由你操控的鹏洛客。（具威吓异能的生物只能被神器生物和／或与它有共通颜色的生物阻挡。）

trans-unit.resname: CMD·111 | Avatar of Slaughter | Card Name
CMD·111 | Avatar of Slaughter | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: All creatures have double strike and attack each combat if able.
trans-unit.target: 所有生物具有连击异能，且每次战斗若能攻击，则必须攻击。

trans-unit.resname: CMD·114 | Chaos Warp | Card Name
CMD·114 | Chaos Warp | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: The owner of target permanent shuffles it into their library, then reveals the top card of their library. If it's a permanent card, they put it onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 选择目标永久物。其拥有者将它洗入其牌库，然后展示其牌库顶牌。如果该牌是永久物牌，则该牌手将它放进战场。

CMD·147 | Collective Voyage | Card Text | Paragraph 1

CMD·206 | Kaalia of the Vast | Card Text | Paragraph 1
CMD·206 | Kaalia of the Vast | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks an opponent, you may put an Angel, Demon, or Dragon creature card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped and attacking that opponent.

trans-unit.resname: CMD·207 | Karador, Ghost Chieftain | Card Name
CMD·207 | Karador, Ghost Chieftain | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature card in your graveyard.

trans-unit.resname: CMD·207 | Karador, Ghost Chieftain | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Once during each of your turns, you may cast a creature spell from your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 仅于你的每个回合中且限一次，你可以从你的坟墓场施放生物咒语。

trans-unit.resname: CMD·210 | The Mimeoplasm | Card Name
CMD·210 | The Mimeoplasm | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may exile two creature cards from graveyards. If you do, it enters the battlefield as a copy of one of those cards with a number of additional +1/+1 counters on it equal to the power of the other card.
trans-unit.target: 于拟生原浆进战场时，你可以将两张生物牌从坟墓场放逐。若你如此作，则它便当作这些牌其中之一的复制品来进入战场，且上面额外有等同于另一张牌之力量的+1/+1指示物。

CMD·220 | Riku of Two Reflections | Card Text | Paragraph 1

trans-unit.resname: CMD·220 | Riku of Two Reflections | Card Text | Paragraph 2
